sk1.name: Illusory Orb
sk1.desc: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

sk2.name: Waning Rift
sk2.desc: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

sk3.name: Phase Shift
sk3.desc: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

sk4.name: Dream Coil
sk4.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

sk5.name: Ethereal Jaunt
sk5.desc: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
